name: Gerard Piqué

structured_info.background: Gerard Piqué is a Spanish professional footballer who began his career at Manchester United before playing for Zaragoza on loan and achieving prominence at Barcelona. He has represented Spain at both youth and senior levels, typically playing as a centre-back or defensive midfielder. He recently experienced a public separation from Shakira and is prioritizing his children.

summary: Gerard Piqué is a well-known Spanish footballer who has played for prominent clubs including Manchester United and Barcelona, as well as the Spain national team. Beyond his sporting career, he is a public figure who recently garnered attention due to his personal life.
